prompts.artist_description_prompt: Generate a bio for an underground drift phonk artist named NØKTVRN with cyberpunk aesthetics and a cult following.
prompts.image_prompt: Create a Spotify avatar for a dark phonk artist, glitchcore meets cyberpunk, no human face visible, high contrast, dystopian vibes.

ai_stylist_notes.anti_detect_strategy: Avoid facial renders. Always rotate styles slightly between artists. Avoid static prompts.
ai_stylist_notes.avatar_tip: No face, abstract or artistic representation. Match genre mood and platform audience.
